document_data.name: Lettuce
document_data.mainbody: '''Lettuce''' was a leafy vegetable cultivated in the Realms.
document_data.Species:
;Marsh lettuce
: Presumably found in marshes.
;Shragga
: A leaf lettuce.
document_data.Availability: Lettuces were grown in such lands as the [[Dalelands]] and around [[Ghars]] in [[Cormyr]]. Shragga was grown in the Great Dale, where the citizens of [[Uthmere]] grew it and other vegetables and [[herb]]s on their balconies.{{Cite web/Realmslore/Uthmere (Part Two): What Smites the Eye in Uthmere}}
document_data.Notable Lettuce Products:
* Lettuce was often used in salads. For example, the [[Maid of the Moors]] restaurant in [[Mornbryn's Shield]] served a fresh garden salad of lettuce leaves, [[olive]]s, [[parley]], [[parsnip]] shavings, strong [[cheese]] and cottage cheese, for 1 [[cp]].<ref> The [[Inn of the Dripping Dagger]] in [[Waterdeep]] offered a plate of cold meats with lettuce or [[endive]] for 4 cp.<ref>
* Marsh lettuce or [[celery]] was an ingredient in [[roasted cockatrice]].
